channel.title: I have redash 10.1.0 but when I add widgets I don't see the option for visualization
channel.description:
### Issue Summary I have redash 10.1.0 but when I add widgets I don't see the option for visualization in the "Add widget dialog" ![redash_version|301x225](upload://aayzIpi3m6aPs9O4Mtac5AwD2Qj.png)
A summary of the issue and the browser/OS environment in which it occurs.
### Technical details:
* Redash Version:10.1.0 * Browser/OS: * How did you install Redash:self hosted ![redash|690x462](upload://rqvHtVQBJRJjkBZO0dABKzE6AoW.png)

item.title: I have redash 10.1.0 but when I add widgets I don't see the option for visualization
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
The screenshot from your previous post doesn’t show any queries. Please share a screenshot of what you see once you have searched for the query and selected it.

Read full topic
item.source: I have redash 10.1.0 but when I add widgets I don't see the option for visualization

item.title: I have redash 10.1.0 but when I add widgets I don't see the option for visualization
item.dc:creator: Denisa
item.description:
I have searched and found the query I want (it is published) but my problem is that I cannot choose (see screenshot above) any visualization type. I have version 10.1.0 but I don’t see the tabs in the dialog as I see in all the tutorials

Read full topic

item.title: I have redash 10.1.0 but when I add widgets I don't see the option for visualization

1. Have you searched for a query in the search box?
  2. Have you published the queries you want to visualise?
